title: I kept losing focus
description:
Hold right mouse button to move your camera
Mouse wheel to zoom in or zoom out camera

helpo.message: Welcome! My name is Helpo, I am your personal assistant. Click on me to learn more!
You have been selected for our experiment 11010001-10011110
Before we start, when you see an exclamation on my screen it means that I have something to tell you
Soooo... this experiment intends to teach you how to operate a controllable robot by using API
The rules are quiet simple, you do what I tell you and we go home in no time
Well, I just go to sleep mode, but at least I am resting!
Your first task is to understand what are the controlls
